member.name: IDynamicHWHandler.GetDynamicInfo
member.summary: Called by the system to determine whether a particular handler will be shown before the AutoPlay dialog is displayed.
member.param: A pointer to a string that indicates the device path or drive root.
A pointer to the new action string, or NULL if the default action string is to be used.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if this handler is to be displayed, S_FALSE if it is to be hidden, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IDynamicHWHandler
member.summary: Called by AutoPlay. Exposes methods that get dynamic information regarding a registered handler prior to displaying it to the user.
